channel.title: Monkey Butt Stew
channel.description: a persistent buzzing sound followed by 3 1/2 hours of salsa music.
channel.itunes:subtitle: I'm sorry, you didnt have plans did you?
channel.itunes:author: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn
channel.itunes:summary: a persistent buzzing sound followed by 3 1/2 hours of salsa music.

item.title: Episode 2.11:The Muppet Bear Returns
item.description: Fozzy makes his return to the show after his trip to the Sooner State to join Chris and Sona in a discussion of nicknames. We do a little pimpin, plow into the quarterfinals of CHALLENGE!! (Vote at http://bellsouthpwp2.net/v/e/verylongaddress/challenge/monkeybuttvote.htm ) and introduce a new game to the show called "Fake the DJ". To end the show, we all enter into a suicide pact. I'm really gonna miss those two.
item.dc:creator: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn

item.title: Episode 2.10: Jagger or Seger, You Make the Call!
item.description: Fozzy is out of the office this week, so I brought in returning guests Sona and Robin to discuss brushes with celebrity. I admit to being a scaredy-cat, Sona kicks around plans for her own podcast, and Logan generally mucks up the works. En-freakin'-joy!!
item.dc:creator: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn
item.itunes:summary: Fozzy is out of the office this week, so I brought in returning guests Sona and Robin to discuss brushes with celebrity. I admit to being a scaredy-cat, Sona kicks around plans for her own podcast, and Logan generally mucks up the works. En-freakin'-joy!!

item.title: Episode 2.09 : The duo flies solo
item.description: It's "seat-of-our-pants" week as our guest flakes out on us. We slam "The Crow", pimp "Celebrity Rehab" and argue over whether or not Chynna still looks like a man. Give us a shout at monkeybuttstew@hotmail.com
item.dc:creator: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn
item.itunes:summary: It's "seat-of-our-pants" week as our guest flakes out on us. We slam "The Crow", pimp "Celebrity Rehab" and argue over whether or not Chynna still looks like a man. Give us a shout at monkeybuttstew@hotmail.com

item.title: Episode 2.08:Monkey Butt Failure
item.description: We take the show on the road this week to talk to the members of Five Star Failure. Check'em out before they get famous and strung out. You can listen to some of their stuff at http://www.myspace.com/fivestarfailuremusic . The band helps us kick off the second round of CHALLENGE! (Make your vote heard at http://bellsouthpwp2.net/v/e/verylongaddress/challenge/monkeybuttvote.htm ) We also do a little pimpin' and Fozzy shaves his ass. He had to do it this week because it took six guys to hold down the donkey. HEEHEE HE HAWHAWHAW!

item.title: Episode 2.07: Vagitarians Unite!
item.description: Our favorite alternative lifestylist, Robin, drops by the studio to discuss near death experiences(yeah, seeing the light and the whole bit). We also do some Khaki pimpin' and roll along with our Music CHALLENGE!! To vote for your favorite musical artist or band this week go to http://bellsouthpwp2.net/v/e/verylongaddress/challenge/monkeybuttvote.htm Oh, yeah, and Don't Do Drugs, kids, at least not with Fozzy.
item.dc:creator: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn

item.title: Episode 2.06:Chocolate F*ckin' Fountain, Baby!
item.description: Fozzy's buddy Mike joins us this week to discuss New Years Eve memories(how come all our stories end up with someone throwing up?), Christmas Chocolate Fountain hangover, Jamie Lynn Spears' baby-daddy(to quote MSNBC) and we debut the Monkey Butt Stew CHALLENGE! To vote for your favorite musical artist or band this week go to http://bellsouthpwp2.net/v/e/verylongaddress/challenge/monkeybuttvote.htm Lastly, post-Christmas depression gets the best of me when I announce at the ned of the show that all of our listeners can go f*ck themselves. ENJOY!!

item.title: Episode 2.05:Batman smells, Robin laid an egg
item.description: Ho, Ho, Ho kids, it's time for a Monkey Butt Christmas. It's a family show as my lovely wife Sona joins the fray to discuss what it was like growing up with no Christmas as member of a Jehovah's Witness family. We also kick around some fond Christmas memories, our favorite Christmas movies, and I bemoan the loss of a beloved Christmas tradition, "The Chocolate Fountain". Fozzy shows off his new phone, we do a little Kahki Pimpin', and Logan's leads us out with his "Jingle Bells Rendition". WARNING: The first fifteen or so minutes of the show contains a theological discussion. Leave it to Sona to bring something of actual substance to our usual 45 minutes of fart jokes.
item.dc:creator: Chris & Fozzy Blackburn

item.title: Episode 2.04:The Doctor is in
item.description: We welcome Dr.Concussion of Fusebox Funk this week to discuss job history and get in a not-so-quick game of "Gay or Not So Much". Near the end of the show, we travel back in time to the beginning of the show and then realize it wasn't really worth the years we wasted developing the technology. Check out our MySpace page at http://myspace.com/monkeybuttstew/ and give us a shout at 1-641-715-0101 Code*5581534 or monkeybuttstew@hotmail.com

item.title: Reheated Stew
item.description: The Stew Returns!! But to hold you over, here's our greatest moment from Season One!! Warning:Not for the queasy
